name: Fantasy Arena - Tactics
description:
This game is a first prototype of the Fantasy Arena engine; the artistic content is for showcase only. All credits to Wizards of the Coast. 

This prototype, as is, features 9 playable characters and 3 single-player challenges, apart from the versus battle mode. New characters and challenges can always be added.

The game can be played in this page or downloaded. Please, enjoy and give me feedback on bugs and enhancements. Also, if you have artistic skills and want to be a part of the project, talk to me.

:)

Changes decided for the next update:

-> Larger cards appearing with right-click.

-> Change controls button from ESC to TAB (interference with fullscreen).

-> Minor correction in master woda-wan's attack description. It is intended to mean the whole Ally team out of the borders, as the attack functions.
